page.title: 18SAINSBURY'S DEPOT
page.content: Sainsbury's own a chain of supermarkets which are spread all over the country. In Hoddesdon there is a Sainsbury's depot and a Sainsbury's supermarket. Sainsbury's depot is situated in Pindar Road and covers 200,000 square feet. It deals mainly with fresh foodstuffs. It is very important to keep the food fresh. It is only on the shelves in the shops for about twenty four hours at the most. The depot has a fleet of 150 lorries. The food is usually delivered by 7.00 a.m. to 300 shops within a radius of 70 miles. The food is stored in a large cold store. The company only employs men at the depot because of the nature of the work undertaken.
